name: QuickFix
description:
As a bartender, you need to Fix them! It's open bar.

Some pesky customer come to your bar to get their daily fix of cocktails, find what they truly desire to perk them up with your patenting!

Let's serve them cocktails (juste 2 doses) to send them color in our lifes.

Country : France

city : Laval

Gamejammers :

Bastien Bodinau = modeling, scripting, narrative design.

Cyprien Le Plénier =  scripting, integration.

Yves-Marie Poirier = VR integration, narrative design.
